languages.text: Ответом на речь Ирлиэт служит поток эльдарских оскорблений, с которыми не в силах справиться даже Толкователь Вольного Торговца. Обвинив сестру в сговоре с мон-кай, ксеносы грубо прерывают связь... и все же их корабли больше не преграждают путь.

traits.locale_text: Ответом на речь Ирлиэт служит поток эльдарской брани, с которой не в силах справиться даже толкователь Лорд-капитана. Обвинив сестру в сговоре с мон-кай, ксеносы грубо прерывают связь... и все же их корабли больше не преграждают путь.

languages.text: Yrliet's speech is met with a torrent of Aeldari abuse that is too much for even the Rogue Trader's Elucidator. The xenos accuse her of betraying her kind by conspiring with the mon-keigh, and unceremoniously cut the connection... yet their ships are no longer blocking the way.
languages.original_text: Ответом на речь Ирлиэт служит поток эльдарских оскорблений, с которыми не в силах справиться даже Толкователь Вольного Торговца. Обвинив сестру в сговоре с мон-кай, ксеносы грубо прерывают связь... и все же их корабли больше не преграждают путь.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet's speech is met with a torrent of Aeldari abuse that is too much for even the Lord Captain's Elucidator. The xenos accuse her of betraying her kind by conspiring with the mon-keighs, and cut the connection unceremoniously... yet their ships are no longer blocking the way.

Yrliet's speech is met with a torrent of Aeldari abuse that is too much for even the Lord Captain's Elucidator. The xenos accuse her of betraying her kind by conspiring with the mon-keighs, and cut the connection unceremoniously... yet their ships are no longer blocking the way.

Yrliet's speech is met with a torrent of Aeldari abuse that is too much for even the Lord Captain's Elucidator. The xenos accuse her of betraying her kind by conspiring with the mon-keighs, and cut the connection unceremoniously... yet their ships are no longer blocking the way.

Yrliet's speech is met with a torrent of Aeldari abuse that is too much for even the Lord Captain's Elucidator. The xenos accuse her of betraying her kind by conspiring with the mon-keigh, and unceremoniously cut the connection... yet their ships are no longer blocking the way.

Yrliet's speech is met with a torrent of Aeldari abuse that is too much for even the Lord Captain's Elucidator. The xenos accuse her of betraying her kind by conspiring with the mon-keigh, and unceremoniously cut the connection... yet their ships are no longer blocking the way.

Yrliet's speech is met with a torrent of Aeldari abuse that is too much for even the Rogue Trader's Elucidator. The xenos accuse her of betraying her kind by conspiring with the mon-keigh, and unceremoniously cut the connection... yet their ships are no longer blocking the way.

languages.text: 伊莉耶特的发言遭到了艾达灵族的辱骂，辱骂的难听程度甚至连行商浪人的阐释器都无法接受。那些异形指责她背叛了自己的族人，与猴子同流合污，并毫不客气地切断了通话……但他们的战舰却不再阻挡你的去路。
languages.original_text: Yrliet's speech is met with a torrent of Aeldari abuse that is too much for even the Rogue Trader's Elucidator. The xenos accuse her of betraying her kind by conspiring with the mon-keigh, and unceremoniously cut the connection... yet their ships are no longer blocking the way.

traits.locale_text: 伊莉耶特的发言遭到了艾达灵族的辱骂，辱骂的难听程度甚至连行商浪人的阐释器都无法接受。那些异形指责她背叛了自己的族人，与猴子同流合污，并毫不客气地切断了通话……但他们的战舰却不再阻挡你的去路。

languages.text: Las palabras de Yrliet reciben por respuesta una sarta de insultos Aeldari que ni siquiera el Dilucidador de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán puede procesar. Los xenos la acusan de traicionar a su gente al cooperar con un{mf||a} mon-keigh y cortan la conexión bruscamente... pero sus naves ya no obstruyen el paso.
languages.original_text: Yrliet's speech is met with a torrent of Aeldari abuse that is too much for even the Rogue Trader's Elucidator. The xenos accuse her of betraying her kind by conspiring with the mon-keigh, and unceremoniously cut the connection... yet their ships are no longer blocking the way.

traits.locale_text: Las palabras de Yrliet reciben por respuesta una sarta de insultos Aeldari que ni siquiera el Dilucidador de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán puede procesar. Los xenos la acusan de traicionar a su gente al cooperar con un{mf||a} mon-keigh y cortan la conexión bruscamente... pero sus naves ya no obstruyen el paso.

languages.text: ユリエットが話をすると、自由開拓者のエルシデイターも手に負えないほどアエルダリに罵倒された。異種族（ゼノ）は、モン＝ケイと共謀して同族を裏切ったとしてユリエットを非難し、乱暴に接続を切る。だが、アエルダリの船はもはや道を塞いでいない。
languages.original_text: Yrliet's speech is met with a torrent of Aeldari abuse that is too much for even the Rogue Trader's Elucidator. The xenos accuse her of betraying her kind by conspiring with the mon-keigh, and unceremoniously cut the connection... yet their ships are no longer blocking the way.

traits.locale_text: ユリエットが話をすると、ロード・キャプテンのエルシデイターも手に負えないほどアエルダリに罵倒された。異種族（ゼノ）は、モン＝ケイと共謀して同族を裏切ったとしてユリエットを非難し、乱暴に接続を切る。だが、アエルダリの船はもはや道を塞いでいない。
ユリエットが話をすると、あなたのエルシデイターも手に負えないほどアエルダリに罵倒された。異種族（ゼノ）は、モン＝ケイと共謀して同族を裏切ったとしてユリエットを非難し、乱暴に接続を切る。だが、アエルダリの船はもはや道を塞いでいない。

languages.text: Yrliets Rede wird mit einer Tirade übelster Aeldari-Beleidigungen quittiert, die selbst für den Elucidator des {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu viel sind. Die Xenos werfen ihr vor, ihr Volk verraten zu haben, indem sie gemeinsame Sache mit Chem-Pan-Sey macht. Sie unterbrechen die Verbindung kurzerhand ... doch ihre Schiffe versperren euch nicht mehr den Weg.
languages.original_text: Yrliet's speech is met with a torrent of Aeldari abuse that is too much for even the Rogue Trader's Elucidator. The xenos accuse her of betraying her kind by conspiring with the mon-keigh, and unceremoniously cut the connection... yet their ships are no longer blocking the way.

traits.locale_text: Yrliets Rede wird mit einer Tirade übelster Aeldari-Beleidigungen quittiert, die selbst für den Elucidator des {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu viel sind. Die Xenos werfen ihr vor, ihr Volk verraten zu haben, indem sie gemeinsame Sache mit Chem-Pan-Sey macht. Sie unterbrechen die Verbindung kurzerhand ... doch ihre Schiffe versperren euch nicht mehr den Weg.

Yrliets Rede wird mit einer Tirade übelster Aeldari-Beleidigungen quittiert, die selbst für den Elucidator des Lord Captains zu viel sind. Die Xenos werfen ihr vor, ihr Volk verraten zu haben, indem sie gemeinsame Sache mit Chem-Pan-Sey macht. Sie kappen die Verbindung kurzerhand ... doch ihre Schiffe versperren euch nicht länger den Weg.

languages.text: La prise de parole d'Yrliet est accueillie avec un torrent d'insultes aeldaris que même l'élucidateur {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre marchande} ne peut tolérer. Les xénos l'accusent de trahir son espèce en s'associant avec les mon-keigh, avant de mettre fin à la connexion sans autre forme de procès... mais leurs vaisseaux ne bloquent plus le passage.
languages.original_text: Yrliet's speech is met with a torrent of Aeldari abuse that is too much for even the Rogue Trader's Elucidator. The xenos accuse her of betraying her kind by conspiring with the mon-keigh, and unceremoniously cut the connection... yet their ships are no longer blocking the way.

traits.locale_text: La prise de parole d'Yrliet est accueillie avec un torrent d'insultes aeldaris que même l'élucidateur {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre marchande} ne peut tolérer. Les xénos l'accusent de trahir son espèce en s'associant avec les mon-keigh, avant de mettre fin à la connexion sans autre forme de procès... mais leurs vaisseaux ne bloquent plus le passage.

languages.text: Yrliet'in konuşmasına Hür Tacir'in Aydınlatıcısı için bile fazla gelen bir Aeldari küfür seli eşlik ediyor. Zenolar, onu mon-keighlerle birlikte komplo kurarak kendi soyuna ihanet etmekle ve bağlantıyı gayriresmî bir şekilde kesmekle suçluyor. Her hâlükârda gemileri artık yolu tıkamıyor.
languages.original_text: Yrliet's speech is met with a torrent of Aeldari abuse that is too much for even the Rogue Trader's Elucidator. The xenos accuse her of betraying her kind by conspiring with the mon-keigh, and unceremoniously cut the connection... yet their ships are no longer blocking the way.
